pkgmetadata.longdescription: Extracts the Backbone from Graphs // An implementation of methods for extracting an unweighted unipartite graph (i.e. a backbone) from an unweighted unipartite graph (e.g., Hamann et al., 2016 doi:10.1007/s13278-016-0332-2), a weighted unipartite graph (e.g., Serrano et al., 2009 doi:10.1073/pnas.0808904106), the projection of an unweighted bipartite graph (e.g., Neal et al., doi:10.1038/s41598-021-03238-3, or the projection of a weighted bipartite graph (e.g., Neal, 2017 doi:10.1177/0308518X16631339).
